1. EuroLeague

The EuroLeague is a professional basketball league that is considered to be one of the top-tier professional club basketball leagues in the world. It is organized by the Euroleague Basketball Company, which is a joint venture between the Union of European Basketball Associations (UEFA) and the National Basketball Association (NBA). The EuroLeague is considered to be one of the most popular professional sports leagues in Europe, and it features some of the best basketball teams and players from across the continent.
